data.description: Easy build Install Wizards based on XML
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WizardMaker makes Install Wizards as Tk::Frame Objects. So a think,
    Tk namespace is OK. But how to build Wizards is described as XML (I
    use XML::Simle). So the XML namespace is also good. I think, it coud
    be a good idea to place such modules (using XML to be Tk) in the
    namespace Tk::XML.
